text: The Swedish Alliance Mission (SAM, ) is a Christian denomination in Sweden. It is mainly based in the town of Jönköping. In 2009 the denomination had 13,448 members. within 167 congregations both inside and outside Sweden. The denomination was created in 1919 from a merger of Jönköping Mission Society, the Jönköping Circle Christian Youth Association and the Scandinavian Alliance Mission in Sweden. ==References== ==Other websites== *Svenska Alliansmissionen *Jönköpings allianskyrka Category:1919 establishments in Sweden Category:Protestantism in Sweden
title: Swedish Alliance Mission
